doc.title: Danza delle cinque
doc.plot: The account about bull fighting in the famous Plaza in Madrid. A film full of emotions and aesthetics to better understand and question this ancient ritual so firmly embedded into the Spanish culture. The documentary takes us inside this world: from the dressing of the matador Luis Encabo to the climax of the final act portraying the bull's death. We find many interesting stories and opinions of famous people who passionately feel for and against this controversial "ART".
